page.title: 18ALEXANDER SYKES
page.content: My name is{Alexander Sykes,}I am 9 years old. I get up at{7.OOam.}I get washed and dressed and then I go downstairs and have my {insulin {injection}because I am a {diabetic.}I have cornflakes for my breakfast. I play with my{Lego}before I go to { {school.}I call for Chris at 8.3Oam and we walk to school. We go into school at{9.OOam}.First we do our {Maths}and then we go to{Assembly}where we usually hear about{Jesus.}After a break we do some {writing.}We have{ {lunch}and we play for a while then we might do some{History}or{Science.}We have playtime and a{story.}I go home at{3.l5pm}and have my tea. I play with my brother {Thomas} and watch{ {television}before I have supper. On Wednesday I go to{Cubs.}I sometimes play out with my friends. I go to bed at{8.3Opm.}
